description:
Simple Timer makes it easy to set up a countdown. With just a few clicks, you can start a timer and be notified when it has run out.

To set up a timer, simply enter the desired time in the format '00:00:00' or '0h 0m 0s'. If you use the first format, the double points will be added automatically.
name: Simple Timer
